channel.title: agile on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in agile on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Behavior Driven Development
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Behavior Driven Development (BDD) Three Practices First, take a small upcoming change to the system – a User Story – and talk about concrete examples of the new functionality to explore, discover and agree on the details of what’s expected to be done.

item.title: Agile Using Clickup As Agile Management Tool
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: ClickUp is the powerful tool that we decided to stop by after Trello and the whole bundle of similar tool for Agile Management.

item.title: Agile How To Create Clickup Tickets
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: To make sure everyone in the hood can understand the state of company task, the below fields are required to be filled:

item.title: Definition Of Done
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Definition of done also known as DoD is a list of criteria which must be met before a product increment (story) is considered “done”.

item.title: Estimation In Agile
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Estimation (or estimating) is the process of finding an estimate, or approximation, which is a value that is usable for some purpose even if input data may be incomplete, uncertain, or unstable.

item.title: Sprint Lifecycle
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Sprint “milestones” Below listed are the rules for each step of the sprint lifecycle. No exceptions will be made for any of the points.
